about_the_game:
The Lynn Artbook. If you liked the game, consider buying this DLC
This DLC is a Digital Art Book of Lynn.

*This book consists of 120 pages.

Art Book is provided as a PDF file and written in English and Korean.

Featuring:

Concept Art - see how the many details things such as stories, characters, puzzles evolved during game's development.

Artist's Notes - You can own and enjoy their work described by many artists of Lynn.
Developer's Commentary - Developers wrote comments that give a glimpse of the story behind Lynn
Unpublished illustration - Art illustrations that are not released in the main game.

Access:

After download, you'll find the Artbook in your game's directory folder,

accessible through:
(Installation Path)\Lynn_ArtBook\Artbook_Lynn.pdf

ex) E:\Program Files (x86)\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\Lynn\Lynn_ArtBook\The Art Of Lynn_Eng.pdf

fullgame.name: Lynn , The Girl Drawn On Puzzles

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8, Snow Leopard 10.6.3, or later.
  • Processor: Intel Mac 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM

name: Lynn , ArtBook + Commentary

subs.option_text: Lynn , The Girl Drawn On Puzzles Commentary + Art Book - $8.99

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8/ 8.1 / 10 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Dual core 2.6 ghz+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTS 450 or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

supported_languages:
English, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean*, German, Spanish - Spain, French, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support
